alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 6:02PM EST until January 08 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. Greatest accumulations across the Boston Hills. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times with snow covered roads and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute on Friday.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
